# stepfinder

<img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="139" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `stepfinder` is to detect a step in one dimensional data. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of stepfinder from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("stepfinder")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("matiasandina/stepfinder")
```

## Example


```{r example}
library(stepfinder)
## basic example code
```
